mapper.sql: a.PRD_SEQ, a.PRD_CDE, a.PRD_NAME, a.PRD_MEMO, a.PRD_TYPE, a.MIN_LOAN_AMT, a.MAX_LOAN_AMT, a.PAY_TERM, a.REPAY_MODE, a.GL_RAT_BASE, a.GL_DUE_DAY_OPT, a.INT_RAT, a.INT_RAT_ED, a.GL_OD_RATE, a.GL_OD_MIN_AMT, a.GL_OD_COMM_PART, a.PREMIUM_RATE, a.POLICY_AMT, a.OVER_FEE_AMT, a.FEE_AMT, a.CAP_CDE, a.CRT_DT, a.CRT_USR, a.MDF_DT, a.MDF_USR
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CL_PRD_INFO( PRD_SEQ, PRD_CDE, PRD_NAME, PRD_MEMO, PRD_TYPE, MIN_LOAN_AMT, MAX_LOAN_AMT, PAY_TERM, REPAY_MODE, GL_RAT_BASE, GL_DUE_DAY_OPT, INT_RAT, INT_RAT_ED, GL_OD_RATE, GL_OD_MIN_AMT, GL_OD_COMM_PART, PREMIUM_RATE, POLICY_AMT, OVER_FEE_AMT, FEE_AMT, CAP_CDE, CRT_DT, CRT_USR, MDF_DT, MDF_USR ) VALUES ( #{PRD_SEQ}, #{PRD_CDE}, #{PRD_NAME}, #{PRD_MEMO}, #{PRD_TYPE}, #{MIN_LOAN_AMT}, #{MAX_LOAN_AMT}, #{PAY_TERM}, #{REPAY_MODE}, #{GL_RAT_BASE}, #{GL_DUE_DAY_OPT}, #{INT_RAT}, #{INT_RAT_ED}, #{GL_OD_RATE}, #{GL_OD_MIN_AMT}, #{GL_OD_COMM_PART}, #{PREMIUM_RATE}, #{POLICY_AMT}, #{OVER_FEE_AMT}, #{FEE_AMT}, #{CAP_CDE}, #{CRT_DT}, #{CRT_USR}, #{MDF_DT}, #{MDF_USR} )
